message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its high value and unique features, I am confident it will significantly contribute to your operations. Considering its worth and the potential impact on your company, I am offering this exceptional item to you for $14000. This price reflects a strategic midpoint between its intrinsic value of $15000 and your estimated worth of $12000, aiming to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction. Should you have any questions or require further details, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.
